channel.title: Stuck on Apprehension
channel.description:
Hello! I'm currently on the Apprenhension chapter of this great game however when I enter that room where the lights go out and you get "kidnapped", nothing happens... I've killed every other mob in the area and i go in there and nothing happens... Is this a common bug? or have I missed something?
Thanks for help!

item.title: Stuck on Apprehension
item.dc:creator: Wajje
item.description:
I got it! I was finally kidnapped! I ran around here for nearly two hours before i got it! Thanks all!

Read full topic

item.title: Stuck on Apprehension
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Are you sure you went into the correct room? There’s multiple rooms. The correct one is behind the doors you have to open with the switch.

Read full topic
